title: Unified Transaction Schema
description: Defines the structure for a single financial transaction in the unified ledger.

transaction_id.description: A unique identifier for the transaction, ideally a hash of its contents.

timestamp.description: The date and time of the transaction in ISO 8601 format.

description.description: A textual description of the transaction.

amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction.

source_file.description: The path to the original statement file from which this transaction was extracted.
